title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might be uncomfortable hearing someones secrets or personal business today. Although its not necessarily gossip when an individual confides in you about their own issues or concerns, it is a different story if they are talking about other people and their private affairs. Even if youre curious, be mindful that rumor-milling is seen as a deep offense in many spiritual traditions for a good reason. Discussing a person who isnt present to defend themselves or articulate their feelings on their own terms just isnt fair. Above all, follow the Golden Rule: do unto others as you would have them do unto you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
